articles.title: BofA appoints co-presidents as CEO Moynihan says he will serve through the decade - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Bank of America appointed Dean Athanasia and Jim DeMare as co-presidents on Friday, in a sign that the second-largest U.S. lender is preparing potential...
articles.content:
By Lananh Nguyen, Ateev Bhandari and Saeed Azhar
NEW YORK (Reuters) - Bank of America appointed Dean Athanasia and Jim DeMare as co-presidents on Friday, in a sign that the second-largest U.S. lende… [+2310 chars]
